column2: on to the food.  Stuffed Mushrooms
column3: fantastic.  Rioja Braised Short Rib with Manchego Mashed Potatoes
column4: UNBELIEVABLE!  Platter of Spanish Cured meats and cheese with Tomato Bread
column6: but I couldn't stop thinking that perhaps a restaurant that wasn't a chain would have done this even better. Also the pork kabob with spicy potatoes was overdone and rather tasteless
column7: a huge disappointment since this was my fave on my first visit
column9: I think this shows that the food is largely hit or miss.
